title: Chapter 2544 - 2544 Chapter 2544-Demig.O.D Battle
body:
Chapter 2544 - 2544 Chapter 2544-Demig.O.D Battle

2544 Chapter 2544-demiG.o.d battle

“Golden Saint Dragon King!”

The non-human King said coldly.

This golden true dragon was the king of the true dragon Tribe, the Golden Saint Dragon King. He was a demiG.o.d and was the strongest existence in the true dragon Tribe, second only to the ancestral Dragon.

He was even stronger than the nine Dragons back then!

In the divine beast clan, the top ten Battle Beasts were not the strongest. Some were comparable to the top ten Battle Beasts, or even surpa.s.sed them.

For example, the Golden sacred Dragon King, heavenly Tiger Thearch, and so on.

The reason why the top ten beasts were so famous was because they were special.

The top ten Battle Beasts were almost all mutated. For example, there were Nine Dragons and nine-headed Golden Lions. In the world, there was only one of them. Each of them had amazing talent, which was why they were so famous.

“You killed so many of my Dragon tribe’s tribesmen. I’ll tear you to pieces! The Golden Holy Dragon King’s eyes were cold.

The Golden Holy Dragon King roared and pounced towards the non-human King, engaging in an intense battle.

“Golden Holy Dragon King, how many of us can you stop by yourself?”

A cold voice sounded. Not far away, the s.p.a.ce trembled and another non-human King appeared. His powerful aura pressed down on the Golden Holy Dragon King,

“Oh, really? Do you think there’s no one else in the heaven realm?”

A sharp voice rang out.

The s.p.a.ce cracked open, and a huge Phoenix covered in red flames flew out.

Roar!

With a roar, a Giant Tiger the size of a mountain appeared on the other side. It was filled with and its aura was extremely terrifying.

old Phoenix King, heavenly tiger emperor, you old guys are all here!

A cold smile appeared on the non-human King’s face.

good. They didn’t die in the ancient battle. This time, they’re dead!

A cold voice rang out. Next to the non-human King, many figures appeared.

fiendish aura

There were a total of eight figures. Including the one who was fighting the Golden Holy Dragon King, there were a total of nine people. Each of them was wearing a crown and had an earth-shattering aura.

With the nine non-human Kings gathered, no one dared to approach within a radius of a few million miles, except for Supreme Emperor sky Tiger and the old Phoenix King.

Those who were fighting and killing consciously stayed away from this area.

These were all unrivaled experts. Once they made a move, the world would be turned upside down. Those who got close and were swept in would be crushed to pieces.

I didn’t expect all nine of you to be here!”

Heavenly tiger Emperor’s expression was extremely serious.

what? there are only three of you in the heaven realm? I’ll finish you off today!

One of the non-human Kings was the most anxious and immediately charged towards the old Phoenix King. Following that, the other non-human King also made his move and fought with the sky Tiger Supreme

Emperor.

However, there were still six other Kings present.

hehe, it seems that those guys from the heaven realm haven’t come yet. Then I’ll take care of these three bcasts first and bring them back to drink with me!

A tall non-human King, with his purple hair flying in the wind, charged out and attacked heavenly Tiger Imperial master with a terrifying move.

He wanted to team up with the other non-human King to deal with sky tiger emperor first.

However, at this moment, a spear pierced through the air toward this non-human King.

The non-human King’s expression changed, and he could only change his move to block the spear. BOOM!

The void exploded and the long spear trembled. A burly man in battle armor stepped out of the dark void, his aura violent.

five elements, your cultivation…

The non-human King was shocked.

The burly man in armor was the five elements Qilin, one of the top ten Battle Beasts. Back then, he had only had the cultivation base of a peak heavenly Emperor. However, he was now a demiG.o.d.

“Are you surprised? I’ll slaughter you today!”

The five elements Qilin was extremely domineering.

slaughter me? hahaha, so what if you’re here? you’ll still die!

The non-human King laughed.

“Count me in!”

With a roar, a huge Golden Lion charged from the distance. Its nine heads let out a long bowl, and its aura was terrifying. It was also a demiG.o.d.

haha, qingcang, it seems like you’ve also broken through!

With a loud laugh, a giant bull appeared, its aura violent.

A middle-aged man was standing beside the giant bull. It was the nine lives devilish silkworm.

Their auras had all reached the demiG.o.d realm.

“How is that possible? How come all of you have reached the demiG.o.d realm?”

‘d.a.m.n it!’

A few non-human Kings cried out in disbelief.

First, it was the five elements Qilin, then the nine-headed Golden Lion, followed by the t.i.tan Longhorn and

the nine lives devilish silkworm. All of them were demiG.o.ds.

They were all peak heavenly emperors in the past.

Although a peak heavenly Emperor was only a step away from becoming a demiG.o.d,

t was extremely difficult

to cross this step. DemiG.o.ds also had the word ‘G.o.d’ in their names. With a wisp of divine fire, they had stepped into a completely different level, a higher level of life. The meaning behind it was completely different.

There were many peak heavenly emperors in the world, but the number of demiG.o.ds was extremely small. If it had only been a single breakthrough, it would still have made sense. However, the five elements Qilin, Qing Cang, the t.i.tan Longhorn, and the nine-lives devilish silkworm had all broken through. This was shocking

No wonder the Kings were so shocked.

weren’t you very powerful in the past because of your high cultivation? let’s fight, now!

kill! Qing Cang roared as his nine lion heads charged toward a non-human King,

At the same time, the t.i.tan longhorn beetle and the nine lives devilish silkworm also attacked a non-human

King

Of the nine non-human Kings, seven of them had opponents.

There were only two left.

‘Let’s attack first and kill them together!”

The eyes of the remaining two non-human Kings glowed with a cold light. They were about to join forces to kill the nine lives devilish silkworm and the others.

At this moment, the void in the distance exploded. A huge mountain suddenly rushed out of the void. It was extremely huge and pressed down on one of the giant beard race beings.

Although the giant beard tribe was extremely powerful, they still couldn’t resist the mountain and were blasted into meat paste.

Whoosh!

Suddenly, a combat sword appeared above the head of another giant beard tribe cultivator and cut him in

half.

In the blink of an eye, two powerful giant beard tribe members had been killed.

“Who’s there? Sneak attack from there!”

“You’re looking for death!”

The two kings were furious.

The giant beard race was a powerful weapon of war. Each of them was extremely powerful, but they were few in number. Now that two of them had been killed, the non-human King’s heart bled.

BOOM! BOOM!

The two of them attacked at the same time. They stretched out two big hands and blasted in the direction of the two weapons. The void there was directly shattered,

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

The two weapons trembled and disappeared. In the next moment, a battle saber appeared above the head of another giant beard tribe member. With a slash, it killed the other giant beard tribe member.

“d.a.m.n it, you’re looking for death!”

The two kings of the non-human race were furious. They rushed out and attacked together. The area was completely destroyed, and the s.p.a.ce was blown into pieces.

“Aiya, you scared this Lord to death!”

In the dark void, a seventeen or eighteen-year-old youth wearing a Daoist robe was shouting and jumping

around, dodging the attacks of the non-human Kings.

If it wasn’t dandan, who else could it be?

22

23
